title: why only one e-commerce flipkart site selling the pixel 4a availablility , why not in amazon ?
content:
we need a availability of pixel 4a in amazon also ,because that we dont have getting issue of outofstock, what we are getting in flipkart , they are using business stretegy to sell the products in day by day turn
